Please enter your date of birth.

Please enter a valid national id
The national id numbers must be 14 digits.
you can upload photo until 4 images
Before we start please, choose your prefered language
password must be at least 8 and max 20 character
Name must be more than 3 characters and less than 15 characters
phone must be at least 9 digits and maximum 15 digit
This text doesn\'t achieve the length requirement

Msh Lwahdak Program Enrollment


I am enrolling in the Msh Lwahdak Patient Support Program, from here on referred to as the “Mesh
Lwahdak program” and authorize Accsight, and their agents, to provide me services under the Program as
described and those that may be added in the future.
Such services include:
• Medication dispensing support.
• Medication and adherence communications.
• Savings offer/s/FOC (if eligible).
If confirmed as eligible, understanding that my information might be sent to my designated specialty/ies
and other healthcare service/s providers in-the service network with my prescription and lab results (if
any) for Janssen products will be made in accordance with the Program terms and conditions.
Information Sharing: I further authorize Accsight to identify my health information and use it in
performing market research and disease-related surveys. I understand and agree that the Accsight may use
my health information for these purposes and may share my health information with my doctors, specialty
pharmacies.
I understand that I do not have to enroll in the Program or receive the Communications, and that I can still
receive Janssen products, as prescribed by my physician. I may withdraw out of the Program entirely at
any time by notifying a Program representative via hotline at 15148. I also understand that the Services
may be revised, changed, or terminated at any time without any prior notification.
Communications: I authorize Msh Lwahdak program to contact me by mail, telephone or email, if I
indicate my agreement and consent below, with information about the Program and products; services,
and research studies; and to ask my opinion about such information and topics, including market research
and disease-related surveys.
I expressly consent to receive phone calls from or on behalf of the Program at the mobile telephone
number(s) that I provide. I confirm that I am the subscriber for the mobile telephone number(s) provided,
and I agree to notify Accsight if any of my number(s) change in the future.


Patient Authorization to Use and Disclose Health Information


I authorize my healthcare providers and staff, health plan or programs that provide me healthcare benefits,
and any specialty pharmacies that dispense my medication related to Mesh Lwahdak program to disclose
to Accsight and their agents, health information about me including information related to my medical
condition and treatment, prescription (including fill/refill information), and referral to information about
me described as “My Information” for the purposes of enrolling me in and providing certain services,
including:• To determine if I am eligible to participate in Msh Lwahdak Patient Support Program coverage
determination or other support programs
• For the operation and administration of the Program
I understand that Accsight agrees to protect My Information by using and disclosing it only for the
purposes allowed by me in this Authorization, or as otherwise allowed by law. I understand that I do not
have to agree this Authorization. However, if I do not agree this Authorization, I understand that I will not
be able to participate in Msh Lwahdak Patient Support Program. I understand that this Authorization shall
remain in effect until my participation in Msh Lwahdak Patient Support Program ends unless and until I
withdraw (take back) this Authorization before then. Further, I understand that I may withdraw this
Authorization at any time by calling a Program representative by hotline at 15148. Withdrawal of this
Authorization will end my participation in Msh Lwahdak Patient Support Program and will not affect any
disclosure of My Information based on this Authorization made before my request is received and
processed by my healthcare providers and staff and specialty pharmacies.
I authorize Msh Lwahdak Patient Support Program, Accsight, their agents to:
1- Use the information that I provided on this form to determine my eligibility for, and assist with my
continued participation in Msh Lwahdak Patient Support Program.
2- Use my I.D. for purposes of verifying my identity only.
3- Contact me to seek feedback on Msh Lwahdak Patient Support Program services.
I have read and understand the information provided above regarding Msh Lwahdak, I have discussed it
with my physician and all of my questions have been answered to my satisfaction.
I hear by authorize Msh-Lwahdak application services to use the platform for telecommunication for
following up my medical condition with any third party related to Msh Lwahdak program.
I hear by give my informed consent for the use of Msh Lwahdak in my case.
Before we start we are kindly ask you to read and agree the terms and conditions of the program
you can join us , login or create a new account to get benifits of our app .
Enter Your mobile number to recieve a verification code
